milestone_title: Immediate communication and education campaign (package built + deployed)
milestone_description: Develop and distribute educational content (fact sheets, infographics, videos) and hold community meetings to discuss issues and distribute materials.

milestone_title: Neutral education campaign on master plan options (comparative analysis + forums)
milestone_description: Prepare comparative analysis of master plan options, develop materials explaining options, and host public forums/listening sessions to gather feedback.
Compile available funding sources (federal/state/private), pros/cons, and strategic recommendations for how to pursue and advocate for funding.
Develop community profiles to illustrate impacts and ensure community voices are understood and represented in advocacy.
Develop advocacy campaign materials and plan/host town halls and informational sessions, including financial implications and referendum process.
Launch public awareness campaign, develop materials (brochures, social posts), organize demonstrations, and drive media coverage.

milestone_title: Post-referendum review + initiate funding application processes
milestone_description: Review and adjust project plans based on referendum results and initiate funding application processes.
